sentences.english: In most browsers to select one paragraph at a time, triple-click on it.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数浏览器中，三击以选择段落。

sentences.english: Some browsers will also put the pieces together if you start download several times.
sentences.chinese: 有一些浏览器也支持断点续传。

sentences.english: It's sufficient to aim for close-enough uniformity across browsers.
sentences.chinese: 在各浏览器中获得接近一致的外观就足够了。

sentences.english: Beef up your Dolphin by installing your favorite Add-ons.
sentences.chinese: 通过安装你喜爱的插件来加强你的海豚浏览器。

sentences.english: Subsequently, browsers produced by Netscape and Microsoft have become predominant.
sentences.chinese: 最后，网景公司和微软公司的浏览器居于主宰地位。

sentences.english: Display your IP address, location, operation system, brower and so on.
sentences.chinese: 显示您当前的IP地址，地址，浏览器，系统等。

sentences.english: You can imagine the spaghetti code when dealing with all of the browsers it must support.
sentences.chinese: 您可以想象一下处理所有支持的浏览器的代码大拼盘。

sentences.english: You can view the content from external viewers.
sentences.chinese: 可以用外部浏览器查看内容。

sentences.english: First, the BHO is tied to the browser's main window.
sentences.chinese: 首先，BHO对象依托于浏览器主窗口。

sentences.english: Visit the Overview Diagram from Database Explorer feature.
sentences.chinese: 访问数据库浏览器的概况图特性。

sentences.english: We have a stand-alone website with browser-based game.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个基于浏览器的游戏独立网站。

sentences.english: This enables you to add browser-specific attributes to your controls.
sentences.chinese: 这允许您向控件添加浏览器特定特性。

sentences.english: Btw, I had to swith browsers to even POST this comment.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我就为了发这个评论还得切换浏览器。

sentences.english: If so, it's surely well vetted and compatible with all popular browsers.
sentences.chinese: 如果是这样的话，它应该能兼容所有流行的浏览器。

sentences.english: Agent sits in browser-side of things and talks directly with the Application Under Test.
sentences.chinese: Agent呆在浏览器一方，直接与被测程序打交道。

sentences.english: In your Web browser's cache are the most recent Web files that you have downloaded.
sentences.chinese: 网页浏览器的高速缓存区里有你最近下载的网页文件。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
